tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gene_annotations (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    go_id VARCHAR(20),
    go_term VARCHAR(255),
    classification VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE GeneFunctionalClassification (
    gene_id INT,
    classification_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (gene_id, classification_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES GeneAnnotations(gene_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (classification_id) REFERENCES FunctionalClassification(classification_id)
);
